title: Top 7 KDP Keyword Research Tools for Low Content Books and No Content Books
description:
Top 7 KDP Keyword Research Tools for Low Content Books and No Content Books

New to KDP Publishing? - Start Here: https://youtu.be/LAIDXxUAgNw

Gumroad Store for Interiors and Keywords:  https://gumroad.com/paulmarles

There are many tools and pieces of software for keyword research on books published on the KDP platform. I show you my Top 7 tools for performing keyword research on low content books and no content books. The pros and cons and both free and paid keyword research tools. I show you how to do all your research with free keyword tools and how to speed up the process using paid tools.

AMZ Suggestion Expander: http://bit.ly/2OqqrPo

Keywords Everywhere: http://bit.ly/397xaph

Keywordtools.io: http://bit.ly/2TieOeS

Helium 10: http://bit.ly/381bxGl

For Helium 10 use the discount codes - LCB10 for 10% discount per month or LCB50 for 50% discount off the first month.

Publisher Rocket: http://bit.ly/2ThC390
